tool_description: An api with all csgo cases and skins.
name: CSGO Items
title: CSGO Items

api_list.name: Get the skins inside a csgo case.
api_list.description:
This endpoint retrieves every skins with its name and an image of the skin. From the case specified.

Use the other end point to get the case_id for every case.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://csgo-items1.p.rapidapi.com/case/chroma-3-case"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "csgo-items1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://csgo-items1.p.rapidapi.com/case/{case_id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "csgo-items1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all csgo cases
api_list.description: This endpoint retrieves every csgo case and images of the cases.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://csgo-items1.p.rapidapi.com/cases"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "csgo-items1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
